basic.description:
Geographical approaches to the relationship between human health and environment. Individual and population health outcomes of physical and social environmental influences and the development of policy responses.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;24I;24O;36P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Geography, the Environment and Human Health

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 and (GPHY240 or GPHY247 or KNPE251 or PHED251), or permission of the Department.
